title: Average GIM TK

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Threaten someone with your awesome and OP GIM abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can have one person threatened in a game.
- The threatened person is not aware of being threatened.
- You, at the end of the day, will receive the number of messages that your target lied in.
- The host will pick X number of specific messages to show you.
- If your target lies above X number of times, you can call the cops on them and you will promote to 3922b.

desc:
Post 3922a
*The iconic GIM experience in one role!*
